posts.post_title: PSA 5 mk  N172  John Ward  Old Judge
posts.post_content: Selling   PSA 5 (mk)  1887 N172 Old Judge   John (Monte) Ward---The mark is small 2 intials on back in pencil----$1500---I also will be at the National  Table 1057---thanks,  Don
